author: Siamak Masnavi, CD Analytics
title: Bitcoin Holds Above $105K Despite Donald Trump’s Threats Against Elon Musk
description: Bitcoin remains above $105K as Trump threatens Elon Musk in a high-profile feud, showing crypto's resilience amid political drama and rising market tension.
content:
Bitcoin 
 held firm above $105,000 on Saturday despite an unusually combative and personal escalation in the Trump-Musk feud that could rattle traditional markets next week.On Saturday, in a phone i… [+1957 chars]
